title: Barry Andrews (musician) - Wikipedia
snippet: Barry Andrews (born 12 September 1956) is an English songwriter, singer and keyboard player who is a co-founder of Shriekback and was formerly a member of XTC and the League of Gentlemen. Barry William Andrews was born in West Norwood, London, on 12 September, 1956, the only child of bricklayer ...

title: Barry Andrews - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Barry Andrews. Actor: The Spy Who Loved Me. Barry Andrews was born in 1944 in the UK. He is an actor, known for The Spy Who Loved Me (1977), Dracula Has Risen from the Grave (1968) and Department S (1969).

title: Barry Andrews (politician) - Wikipedia
snippet: Barry Andrews (born 16 May 1967) is an Irish politician who serves as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for the Dublin constituency. He is a member of Fianna Fáil, part of Renew Europe. He previously served as Minister of State for Children from 2008 to 2011.

title: Barry Andrews Songs, Albums, Reviews, Bio & Mo... | AllMusic
snippet: Barry Andrews was the keyboardist for XTC on their first two albums, 1978's White Music and Go2. Frustrated with the band having too many cooks in the kitchen, Andrews left the group in January of 1979…
